fullgame.name: From Bedrooms to Billions: The Amiga Years

name: From Bedrooms to Billions: The Amiga Years: David Pleasance - Launching the BATMAN PACK Christmas 1989
short_description: David Pleasance formerly of Commodore UK tells the story of how he came up with one of the most successful bundles in computer history! The Commodore Batman Pack launched for Christmas 1989 and was the catalyst that saw the Amiga become a massive european hit! However he had to pitch the idea to Oce
